review.title: “Fantastic Training and Experience - Poor Company Culture from the Top Down”
review.pros: Pros – as a sales associate, you can be a person - not a sales person. Fantastic Training and experience. The top sales manager is extremely intelligent about sales and is helpful in keeping you on top of your game.
review.cons: Cons – Managers try to micro manage every single aspect of your work. Because they try to take on too much they are unable to effectively control the workplace in a positive way- this leads to incredible amounts of negativity among the staff and a relatively high turnover rate.
review.advice-to-management: No, I would not recommend this company to a friend
